name: Anaba Shaman
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Just try taking *this* bull by the horns.

name: Angelic Page
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

name: Aven Cloudchaser
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

name: Aven Fisher
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

name: Aven Flock
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

name: Balduvian Barbarians
flavor_text:
"From the snowy slopes of Kaelor,
To the canyons of Bandu,
We drink and fight and feast and die
As we were born to do."
—Balduvian tavern song

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Returne from whence ye came. . . ."
—Edmund Spenser, *The Faerie Queene*

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

name: Canyon Wildcat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: In the warrior kingdom of Keld, the cats used in the hunt are prized for their tracking sense and ability to climb walls.

name: Catalog
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
Though those who study are as many as the hairs on an ox, those who succeed are as rare as unicorns' horns.
—Chinese proverb

name: Cinder Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
—Onean sergeant

name: Coastal Hornclaw
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."

name: Coral Eel
flavor_text: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

name: Craw Wurm
flavor_text: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

name: Crossbow Infantry
oracle_text: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"He can split a marshfly in two from halfway across the range."
—Onean sergeant

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say 'death,'
For exile hath more terror in his look,
Much more than death."
—William Shakespeare, *Romeo and Juliet*

name: Deepwood Ghoul
oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Regenerate Deepwood Ghoul.
flavor_text: They feed on the living to stay undead.

name: Dehydration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text:
"Cry to the sun and watch as even your tears forsake you."
—Acolyte of Marit Lage

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Diving Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
To outrace the griffin
—Kipamu expression meaning "to do the impossible"

name: Drudge Skeletons
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral, *Necromancer's Handbook*

name: Dusk Imp
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . . well, it despises just about everything.

name: Eager Cadet
flavor_text: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the 'training' I needed."

name: Elvish Pioneer
oracle_text: When Elvish Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "Destruction is the work of an afternoon. Creation is the work of a lifetime."

name: Fear
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text:
"The horror! The horror!"
—Joseph Conrad, *Heart of Darkness*

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"The love of nature . . . is a furious, burning, physical greed. . . ."
—Mary Webb, *The House in Dormer Forest*

name: Flash Counter
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text: "So much for that bright idea!"

name: Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor_text: The College of Lat-Nam is often forced to expel students whose experiments grow too risky or too cruel.

name: Giant Badger
oracle_text: Whenever Giant Badger blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Disturb a sleeping badger and the snapping of your bones will awaken the countryside.

name: Giant Cockroach
flavor_text: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Octopus
flavor_text:
"Before my eyes was a horrible monster, worthy to figure in the legends of the marvellous. . . . Its eight arms, or rather feet, fixed to its head . . . were twice as long as its body, and were twisted like the furies' hair."
—Jules Verne, *Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea*, trans. Lewis

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
Watching the spider's web
—Llanowar expression meaning "focusing on the wrong thing"

name: Glory Seeker
flavor_text: The turning of the tide always begins with one soldier's decision to head back into the fray.

name: Goblin Chariot
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

name: Goblin Raider
oracle_text: Goblin Raider can't block.
flavor_text: He's smart for a goblin. He can do *two* things: hit *and* run.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Hill Giant
flavor_text: Bent on a quest for blood, a giant can storm through a fort's wall as if it were nothing more than a picket fence.

name: Holy Day
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"The day of Spirits; my soul's calm retreat / Which none disturb!"
—Henry Vaughan, "The Night"

name: Holy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

name: Honor Guard
oracle_text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Horned Troll
oracle_text: {G}: Regenerate Horned Troll.
flavor_text: Sword hilts jut from some trolls' bodies where wounds healed so fast that the weapons were trapped inside.

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

name: Index
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.
flavor_text: Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Catch!"

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave,
He passes from life to his rest in the grave."
—William Knox, "Mortality"

name: Lone Wolf
oracle_text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor_text: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

name: Looming Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

name: Maggot Carrier
oracle_text: When Maggot Carrier enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"We do not suddenly fall on death, but advance towards it by slight degrees; we die every day."
—Seneca, *Epistles*, trans. Gummere

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Master Decoy
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.

name: Merchant of Secrets
oracle_text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Get in touch with your inner monster.

name: Moss Monster
flavor_text: After the battle, an eerie silence gripped the forest. The losers' remains were lightly dusted with green.

name: Nantuko Disciple
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Unanswered prayers are themselves answers.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"One touch of nature makes the whole world kin."
—William Shakespeare,
*Troilus and Cressida*

name: Nausea
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

name: Norwood Ranger
flavor_text: The song of the forest is in perfect harmony. If a single note is out of place, the elves will find its source.

name: Orcish Spy
oracle_text: {T}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library.
flavor_text:
"You idiot! Never let the spies mingle with the orcish regulars after completing a mission. Now we'll never get them to fight!"
—General Khurzog

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Panic Attack
oracle_text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

name: Plague Beetle
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: No one knows whether they were named for the disease they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

name: Razorfoot Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Redeem
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to up to two target creatures.
flavor_text:
"Let me redeem my brothers both from death."
—William Shakespeare, *Titus Andronicus*

name: Reflexes
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Be as fast as lightning, and you will be just as deadly."
—Combat trainer

name: Regeneration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"Why should death always have the last word?"
—Llanowar druid

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Ridgeline Rager
oracle_text: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

name: Rushwood Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: To a dryad, every tree in the forest is both a doorway and a window.

name: Sabretooth Tiger
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: To a sabretooth, all men are mice.

name: Sacred Nectar
oracle_text: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Over the silver mountains,
Where spring the nectar fountains,
There will I kiss
The bowl of bliss;
And drink my everlasting fill. . . ."
—Sir Walter Raleigh, "The Pilgrimage"

name: Sage Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

name: Samite Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

name: Scathe Zombies
flavor_text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Sea Eagle
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: A hiss before dying.

name: Severed Legion
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"I love lightning! It's my best invention since the rock."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

name: Shock Troops
oracle_text: Sacrifice Shock Troops: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: War is a conflict that determines not who is right—but who is left.

name: Sizzle
oracle_text: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
"Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight *everything* with fire."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Sneaky Homunculus
oracle_text: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

name: Solidarity
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately."
—Benjamin Franklin

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text:
"I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now *that's* a plan!"
—Wandering mage

name: Spineless Thug
oracle_text: Spineless Thug can't block.
flavor_text: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

name: Standing Troops
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Suntail Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

name: Trained Armodon
flavor_text: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

name: Tundra Wolves
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains."
—Onean scout

name: Twiddle
oracle_text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

name: Unholy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor_text: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

name: Vicious Hunger
oracle_text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Only the most ravenous soul feeds on the health of the weak.

name: Vine Trellis
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Nature twists knots stronger than any rope.

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"But high she shoots through air and light,
Above all low delay,
Where nothing earthly bounds her flight,
Nor shadow dims her way."
—Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

name: Wood Elves
oracle_text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.
